column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=A friend of mine had a birthday coming up , so I decided to bake her a cake .
#text=I knew that she loved vanilla cake with chocolate icing , so that is what I decided to make .
#text=I had a cookbook that has a nice and easy recipe for vanilla cake .
#text=I got out the cookbook and read the ingredients list .
#text=I decided to take out all the ingredients at once to make it easier and make sure I had everything I needed .
#text=When I had everything I needed , I took out the bowls and pan and began to mix the ingredients .
#text=I did it just as the recipe stated , so I would n't miss anything and make the cake taste funny .
#text=When the cake batter was complete , I poured it into a pan and put it in the oven that was already hot .
#text=I set the timer on the oven .
#text=While the cake was baking , I read the recipe for the chocolate icing .
#text=I got all those ingredients out and proceeded to make the icing .
#text=It came out great and was very chocolaty tasting .
#text=Now the cake was done so I took it out to cool off .
#text=When it had cooled off , I proceeded to frost the cake with the icing I had made .
#text=It was hard at first , but I got the hang of it and was able to smooth out any lumps I made very easily .
#text=I put some candles on the cake to finish it .
#text=When I gave it to my friend , she was so excited .
#text=We lit her candles and she blew them out .
#text=We all had a slice of cake and everyone agreed that this was the best tasting cake they had ever had .
#text=I was very proud that I made such a great cake .
